jd_criteria_summary.role_title: Full Stack Development Intern (IIoT & Data Analytics Platform)
key_requirements: B.Tech in CSE or related field, having completed the 3rd year.
Experience with at least one full stack project.
Strong skills in JavaScript, data structures, and web technologies.
Backend experience with Node.js and Express.js.
Database knowledge including InfluxDB, Redis, and NoSQL (e.g., MongoDB).
Familiarity with MQTT/REST APIs and Git.
preferred_attributes: Exposure to IoT, Docker, or CI/CD.
Interest in time-series data and cloud-native development.
